title: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Policing, Security and
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Policing, Security and
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Policing, Security and 

Community Safety Act 2024 (Retirement) Regulations 2025. 

(2) These Regulations shall come into operation on 17 April 2025.
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited policing security community safety act 2024 (retirement) regulation 2025 (2) regulation shall come operation 17 april 2025

title: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Policing, Security and
heading: 2. Notwithstanding anything contained in -
text_raw:
2. Notwithstanding anything contained in - 

(a) 

the Gárda Síochána (Retirement) Regulations 1934 (S. R. 
& O. No. 146 of 1934), as continued in force by section 128 
of the Garda Síochána Act 2005 and section 261 of the 
Policing, Security and Community Safety Act 2024 (No. 1 
of 2024), or 

(b) 

the Gárda Síochána (Retirement) (No. 2) Regulations 1951 
(S.I. No. 335 of 1951), as so continued in force, 

the member of An Garda Síochána who, immediately before the coming into 
operation of these regulations, holds the rank of Garda Commissioner shall retire 
on 1 September 2025.
text_norm: 2 notwithstanding anything contained - (a) garda siochana (retirement) regulation 1934 (s r o no 146 1934) continued force section 128 garda siochana act 2005 section 261 policing security community safety act 2024 (no 1 2024) (b) garda siochana (retirement) (no 2) regulation 1951 (s.i no 335 1951) continued force member garda siochana immediately coming operation regulation hold rank garda commissioner shall retire 1 september 2025

title: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Policing, Security and
heading: 3. The Garda Síochána (Retirement) Regulations 2023 (S.I. No. 397 of
text_raw:
3. The Garda Síochána (Retirement) Regulations 2023 (S.I. No. 397 of 

2023) are revoked. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 13th May, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 The Government hereby approve of the foregoing Regulations. 

[177] 3 

GIVEN under the Official Seal 
of the Government, 
15 April, 2025. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

16 April, 2025. 

JIM O’CALLAGHAN, 
Minister for Justice. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [177]
